brutal_question.question: in what year was Nintendo founded?

While many people know Team Fortress 2, the original Team Fortress started as a mod to Quake. It also started with five classes as opposed to the modern nine. Which classes did the original Team Fortress start out with?
In The Legend of Zelda (NES), What color is Link's Tunic? (Answer only acceptable as a hexidecimal value)
What color are mario and luigi's overalls in Super Mario Bros (NES)? hint: they're two different colors!
This game's working title was 'Dark Ring.' this was changed due to Dark Ring possibly being slang for anus.

Tiger Electronics is infamous for its myriad of LED screen games that were incredibly primitive even in their prime. They even made a game console in 1995 to contest what they believed was their biggest competitor: the Virtual Boy. What was this console?
As of June 26, 2023, how many playable characters are currently available in 100% Orange Juice, not counting event-exclusive characters? (will accept ranges of 10, e.g. 1 - 10, 11 - 20)

In an elaborate plan to get Japanese players into their game, Valve, in partnership with Taito, released Left 4 Dead 2 in Japan as an arcade game in 2014, with its service being shut down in 2017. What was this arcade game called in Japan, when translated?
After receiving immense backlash from an incredibly infamous incident, Blizzard received a letter in October 2019 from a very significant source. Who sent this letter?
Among the original Smash 64 roster, which two characters are considered to be in the top half of tier lists in all Smash titles?
While Sega IPs have been appearing on Nintendo consoles since 2001,  a single Nintendo IPs appeares on a Sega console. Which Nintendo franchise was it, and on which Sega console did this occur?
While Mario has been Nintendo's mascot for over forty years with over a hundred games spanning their systems, there are only two Nintendo consoles in which he doesn't appear in. Name at least one.

who_the_heck_is_that.question: This titular titular protagonist is whisked to Morning Land where he must do battle with Dark Raven!
Unite Hand! Will Wedgewood is a mild mannered school teacher, but when the fate of the world is hanging by a thread he'll transform into this super hero.
Alone initially, this character later befriends Chris, John, Claire, Laura, James, and Sarah

A mechanic at heart, this boy has found himself to be a new commanding officer for the Orange Star army. With great passion and determination, he will prove to always be a threat, even to a copy of himself. But first, he needs to find out what an airport is.
As a child soldier he earned the nickname 'Jack the Ripper' due to his incredibly high kill rate. While his name really is Jack, only his current name is valid.
She wants to be beautiful, so she'll steal your sis. This nasty witch loves to rhyme like this. With every game she looks worse than before. Get this one right and add to your score.

Pick one of these adventurers from some other world, and you’ll embark on an elemental journey filled with dragons, ancient sea monsters, and maybe even a duel with a demigod! Just hope you shelled out enough for the right companions. (Please don’t actually do this.)
The youngest son of Bardock and Gine, he was sent to earth to destroy all life!
While rather petite, this Jellyfish Pirate can effortlessly swing around such a massive weapon with ease, alongside calling her trusty companion, Mr. Dolphin! TOTSUGEKI!
From pirate captain to mad scientist, this kruel kremlin’s got the evil to spare. Too bad a mean gorilla and a monkey always stand in his way of ruling the day.

When you recognize that your world is full of eccentric characters that always settle disputes with puzzle battles, you slowly begin to realize that maybe you’re the only sane person in a land of falling blobs. At least you can beat people up with math, though.
Having gone the opposite direction from his father’s path, this legendary prosecutor has only one goal in his life: find the truth. And maybe lower the detective’s salary again.

While fighting over a pit with something flying in the sky, finish your opponent in two rounds perfectly without blocking. Once you've done that, you've earned your right to fight this elusive, acid-spitting fighter.

She used to make a name for herself by crawling through dungeons, this tomboy sorceress turned to a career in puzzle battles. Just don't ask about her decapitating a dark wizard that one time... or that time she fought the creator of her universe.
